import React from "react"; import BillHomePage from "./billhomepage"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import axios from "axios"; class AddBill extends React.Component { state = { billName: '', paymentMode: '', billAmount: 0, cashBack: 0 } fetchValues(event){ event.target.key(); } genBillId = (event) => { const bill = { billName: this.state.billName, billPaymentMode: this.state.paymentMode, billAmount: this.state.billAmount, cashBack: this.state.cashBack } axios.put("http://localhost:3000/bills/add",{bill}) alert("value:"+this.state.billId) } render() { return
Bill Name Payment Mode Bill Amount Cashback
} } export default AddBill
